item.title: Sky Walk
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Sky Walk

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Peak Pursuit

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Survival Run

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Tree Top

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Zip Adventure
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Zip Adventure

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Jungle Hike

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Sky Walk

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Canyon Swing

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Cliff Climb
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cliff Climb

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Peak Pursuit

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Sky Walk

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Zip Adventure

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Forest Trek
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Forest Trek

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Cave Dive

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Canyon Swing

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Tree Top

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: River Raft
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
River Raft

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Sky Walk

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Canyon Swing

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Jungle Hike

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Mountain Dash
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Mountain Dash

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

River Raft

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Rock Scramble

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Waterfall Jump

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Canyon Swing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Canyon Swing

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Jungle Hike

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Forest Trek

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Waterfall Jump

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Tree Top
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tree Top

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Jungle Hike

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Adventure Race

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Tree Top

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Adventure Race
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Adventure Race

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Cliff Climb

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Cave Dive

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

River Raft

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Rock Scramble
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Rock Scramble

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Mountain Dash

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Cave Dive

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Cliff Climb

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Survival Run
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Survival Run

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Sky Walk

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Canyon Swing

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Forest Trek

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Jungle Hike
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Jungle Hike

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Forest Trek

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Cave Dive

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Survival Run

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Cave Dive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cave Dive

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Cliff Climb

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Rock Scramble

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Survival Run

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Peak Pursuit
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Peak Pursuit

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Sky Walk

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Waterfall Jump

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Jungle Hike

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: Waterfall Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Waterfall Jump

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, test your strength, balance and encourage as you venture on a wild treetop adventure.

Take to the skies for a totally wild adventure!

Adventure from tree to tree in this challenge course tucked in the woods of High Holly Mountain. Designed for almost all ages (geared towards ages 4-10 and accompanying family), the Zippy's Tree Top Adventure features two ziplines and seven challenge elements that will test your group together in the great outdoors. Who will coast across the suspension bridge? Who will dominate the balance beam? Zippy's Tree Top Adventure bragging rights are up for grabs.

During the tour, you will soar up to 200 feet in the air. As you make your way through the native hardwood canopy you are able to reach breathtaking perspectives. Our guides share local history and knowledge of the unique ecosystem to be found here on Boone Creek and in the Kentucky palisades region. The Boone Creek Zip Line Canopy Tour is a thrilling multidimensional experience for the entire family.

Play

What To Know

On this zipline tour, you will experience:

  • A professionally guided zipline tour with 6 ziplines, 3 sky bridges, a rappel, and a spiral and floating staircase.
  • Ziplines up to 1,400 feet long and heights up to 185 feet
  • Speeds up to 40 mph
  • A thrilling soar over Boone Creek and the spectacular Boone Creek Gorge
  • SkyBridges suspended 100+ feet over the forest floor in and above the hardwood canopy
  • Education on the history and ecology of the region
  • A total adrenaline rush!

Requirements

All participants must:

  • Sign the Participant Agreement (waiver) prior to the activity
  • Be at least 4 feet tall
  • Weigh between 70 and 270 pounds
  • Have your parent or legal guardian sign the waiver if under 18 years of age
  • Be prepared and able to actively participate and follow guides instructions
  • Be able to comfortably hold both hands overhead
  • Wear closed-toed shoes
  • Wear long hair tied back

You May Also Like

view all adventures from $45

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

Adventure Race

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more from $45

River Raft

Zip through the treetops, traverse the sky bridge, race across the valley, and take the Dropzone plunge. Ages 5+3 hoursMax 30 Learn more

item.title: School & Camp Groups
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
reconnect your team

ELEVATE TEAM BUILDING & DEVELOP LEADERSHIP

Whether you just want to enjoy some outdoor adventures together, or grow your team with an objective-based, adventure-filled agenda, we can help craft your perfect group outing. Were a flexible, friendly partner for any of your group events. Play

What we do

Team Building

Accelerated Team Growth Standard Team Building plus more rigorous assessment, facilitated discussion, and action plans, for teams focused on performance improvement. 4+ Hours
Starts At $45/Person plan your program

Team Bonding

Grow to be a Better Team We believe that adventure-based team bonding offers unique benefits that go far beyond the expected. 3+ Hours
Starts At $30/Person plan your program

Leader Development

Have Fun Together This program focuses on critical thinking, communication, and resilience through challenge and is a great fit for emerging leaders. 2+ Hours
Starts At $55/Person plan your program

Questions - FAQs

Is there a weight requirement?

No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities. For Ziplining and the High Ropes Course we do require participants to be between 70 and 250 pounds.

What should I wear?

No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities. For Ziplining and the High Ropes Course we do require participants to be between 70 and 250 pounds.

Is there an age requirement?

No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities. For Ziplining and the High Ropes Course we do require participants to be between 70 and 250 pounds.

What if some in my group dont want to zipline?

No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities. For Ziplining and the High Ropes Course we do require participants to be between 70 and 250 pounds.

What does the Team Building program include?

No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities. For Ziplining and the High Ropes Course we do require participants to be between 70 and 250 pounds.
No, there is no weight requirement for participation in our Team Building activities.
